Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
B+H is a member of the Surbana Jurong Group

B+H is a member of the Surbana Jurong (SJ) Group, a global leader in urban solutions ranked 14th in the World Architecture 100 for 2024. With a presence in 40 countries and a diverse workforce representing 103 nationalities, SJ is a powerhouse in the industry. As part of SJ, our team benefits from a vast network of multidisciplinary experts. This allows us to deliver comprehensive solutions that span the entire project lifecycle, from initial planning to final decommissioning. By assembling specialized teams and fostering innovative approaches, we combine strategic thinking with bold and inspiring design to transform spaces, communities, and economies.

United by a shared purpose, our OneSJ approach reflects our commitment to making a positive impact. It embodies our shared identity, values, and vision for the future, and is driven by the desire to create Real Impact, made together.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Architectural design data on medical buildings, office spaces, residential construction, school buildings, commercial complexes, and urban spaces.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, Africa, North America, South America, Europe, Australia (continent), Antarctica
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives
